ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: When you play with the floating HUD, even /cons appear in white rather than black.  Hit f10 once and you will see white =)
ygData.messageBody:
When you play with the floating HUD, even /cons appear in white rather than
black. Hit f10 once and you will see white =)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Trevalien Manix [SMTP:trevalien@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 2:23 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
>
> From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>
>
> @%^#$@#^&%Y@$^*&@^%$#
>
> This is ticking me off! Everyone is always talking about white cons. Why
> has nothing EVER cond white to me? I have had green, blue, black, yellow,
> and red, but never in all my levels (im 13 now) has anything cond
> white...Is
> EQ broken or am i going crazy hehe!
>
> Trevalien
> Maby somthing in the Air Plane will con white to me
>
>
> >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> >Date: Mon, 23 Aug 1999 14:19:43 -0500
> >
> >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> >
> >Well, those people are STUPID IMHO. I don't mind people going AFK as long
>
> >as
> >they SAY TO THE DAMN GROUP THEY ARE AFK. I hate it when your the puller,
> >you
> >say scouting (I always say Scouting and Incoming when i'm pullnig for the
> >group...ALWAYS). Some group member (usually some wizzie) say "Ok", you
> say
> >"Imcoming!" and have a nasty white or yellow on yer ass, get back to the
> >group, and they don't do squat while you get pounded. Now, lucky for us,
> we
> >ALWAYS have SoW on (cuz I never go nito a dungeon anymore...*sigh*), and
> I
> >can usually outrun the mob..but it ticks me off. Especially when I loose
> >other group members cuz the healer or burner was AFK without saying it.
> >
> >AND, I htink anyone that is smart enough to use a dual monitor setup will
>
> >be
> >a good enough player... *chuckle* 'Cept for thouse that would just BUY
> the
> >stuff and have someone else put it together.
> >
> >-Leod
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
> >Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 2:12 PM
> >To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> >
> >
> >From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >
> >Oh god no. That would provide yet another distraction for people. I can
> >think of several instances where I have gotten killed because someone is
> >chatting away on /guildsay. Just think how bad it would be if someone
> was
> >having a /tell conversation, /guildsay, and ICQ going at the same time.
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Trevalien Manix [SMTP:trevalien@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 2:09 PM
> > > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > >
> > > From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>
> > >
> > > I think a good feature for the EQ expantion would be an ICQ option.
> Make
> >a
> > >
> > > window that comes up like the icq window and let us send/recive
> mesages.
> >I
> > >
> > > would love to be able to ues icq in EQ!
> > >
> > > Trevalien
> > > Thinking of the Air Plane
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > > >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > > >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > > >Date: Mon, 23 Aug 1999 14:02:32 -0500
> > > >
> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > > >
> > > >Ya know, one thing I'd like to be able to ALT-TAB outta windows for
> is
> >to
> > >
> > > >do
> > > >OTHER THINGS - Not cheat. Cheating blows the game for me. No
> challenge.
> > > >It's
> > > >fun for a bit, but it's REALLY decreases the amount of time I'll play
>
> >the
> > > >game.
> > > >
> > > >I would LOVE to be able to check ICQ, browse the web, and check my
> >email
> > > >while I'm playing though. UO was good for that atleast!
> > > >
> > > >-Leod
> > > >
> > > >-----Original Message-----
> > > >From: Macabre [mailto:byakhee@...]
> > > >Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 6:23 PM
> > > >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > >Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >From: "Macabre" <byakhee@...>
> > > >
> > > >Sorry, but your "hope something comes of this" when you found you
> could
> > > >ALT - TAB out of the game and hope someone could write a cheat
> program
> > > says
> > > >it all. If you played it straight on Diablo and had a good time, why
> > > would
> > > >you want people to write a cheat program to exploit EverQuest. That
> >just
> > > >doesn't make any sense to me. UNLESS you are the kind of person that
> > > needs
> > > >to cheat to have fun. If you're not, I apologize, but then I just
> don't
> > > >understand why you would sent that email.
> > > >
> > > >Macabre
> > > >----- Original Message -----
> > > >From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
> > > >To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > > >Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 9:08 AM
> > > >Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > I did not say that I had to cheat to have fun with EQ. I have
> lots
> >of
> > >
> > > >fun
> > > > > and haven't taken advantage of any of the "cheats" that this list
> >has
> > > > > provided. I use the guest info, but I don't trap monsters or
> > > anything.
> > > > > From Diablo I was one of the ppl that made it to level 50 with no
> > > >cheats,
> > > > > and only items that I found so I knew they were legit. I also had
> a
> > > > > hacked-to-heck character on Diablo b/c sometimes I think it's fun
> to
> > > run
> > > > > around and kill anything ya darn well please.
> > > > >
> > > > > if I had to cheat to have fun I wouldn't play EQ.
> > > > >
> > > > > Omeg
> > > > >
> > > > > please note lack of flames.
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > >It's players like you that make me sick. Why the hell bother
> >playing
> > > >this
> > > > > >game, if you need to cheat at it to have fun. Go bother someone
> > > else's
> > > > > >game.
